glossary.description: The Client Registration and Identification Service (CRIS) is an e-service that allows companies to authorise their employees or service providers to access HSA e-services in MEDICS or PRISM on behalf of their companies.

The [Medical Device Information Communication System (MEDICS)](http://eservice.hsa.gov.sg/osc/portal/jsp/AA/process.jsp?eService=43&_ga=2.2028017.1774066265.1517188647-1141081152.1511670897) allows companies dealing with medical devices the convenience of carrying out transactions with the Medical Device Branch and view device information online.

The [Pharmaceutical Regulatory Information System (PRISM)](http://www.hsa.gov.sg/content/hsa/en/Health_Products_Regulation/PRISM_e-services.html) gives users the convenience of carrying out transactions with HSA, and searching for related information online.
List of Class A (non-sterile) medical devices that your company is dealing in. These medical devices are exempted from product registration.
